20110118201004.000|20110118201006.000|TR0|look at the last few weeks.  In -- last 
20110118201006.000|20110118201009.000|TR0|month, we had this Florida school board 
20110118201009.000|20110118201011.000|TR0|shooting in -- in Bay County, Florida.
20110118201011.000|20110118201013.000|TR0|
20110118201013.000|20110118201015.000|TR0|We had, in Omaha, an assistant principal 
20110118201015.000|20110118201017.000|TR0|killed, principal shot at the high school. 
20110118201017.000|20110118201020.000|TR0| Nobody wants to be alarmed.  We don't 
20110118201020.000|20110118201022.000|TR0|want everybody to be fear to send their 
20110118201022.000|20110118201024.000|TR0|kids to school and that this is happening 
20110118201024.000|20110118201026.000|TR0|every day.  But schools have to be 
20110118201026.000|20110118201028.000|TR0|prepared.

20110118205112.000|20110118205115.000|TR0|lately is to try to get the Pakistani

20110118205117.000|20110118205119.000|TR0|they, for months now, have really been

20110118205121.000|20110118205123.000|TR0|another natural disaster, which had been
